name: Wrist Nebula
description:
Wrist Nebula is a space battle adventure game. It is an Apple Watch exclusive so you can play on the go, or when ever you are stuck in one place for hours. Save the galaxy from astroids, ships, and bosses using your unique ships and abilities. Can you collect all of the ships?

Features:
- Quick Start: Get right into the action! Start with a random ship in a random star system.)
- Adventures: Select a ship that you have collected, star system color, then save the star system! You can choose a path way across the system ;), but be careful there are more enemies in some places... But you may get a more unique ship! If you can make it across the system you will be faced with a boss. Bosses can be tough but you may be rewarded with an S class ship! And if your brave enough for Hard mode, maybe you can go beyond and find a ??? class Ship.
- Settings: 
Do you want to change the difficulty? 
Are you color blind or use grayscale and want to play in no color symbol mode?
Do you want to invert controls and try a different way to play?
Its all under settings ;)
- Scores: Keep track of your highest scores and compare with your friends!
